protein.specific_function: May be involved in the calcium-dependent regulation of rhodopsin phosphorylation. Binds two calcium ions

reference.reference_text: Takamatsu K, Kobayashi M, Saitoh S, Fujishiro M, Noguchi T: Molecular cloning of human hippocalcin cDNA and chromosomal mapping of its gene. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1994 Apr 15;200(1):606-11.
